item.title: What Happened to the Art of the Deal?
item.description: We urge the administration to allow millions of Americans to receive food aid.

item.title: Virginia Advances Redistricting Plan Toward New Congressional Maps
item.description: The Democrat-controlled legislature approved an amendment that would allow redistricting next year, but the process will take months.
